attributes.action: Remove the petition facility as Government do not take any notice of it!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petition facility appears to be used by Government as another method of propagating their rhetoric rather than an intelligent, effective and reasoned method of engaging with the electorate.

Because of the way Government have handled the facility it would appear to increase the apathy the public feel towards the political process in the UK.

The online petition process could and should have been an excellent way for  Government to gauge the public feeling out in the country but regretfully they never appear to act or change policy based on the petition except to churn out their "reason" for continuing their course of action.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
